name: hlress
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, chl), wss(cr, c1), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), cdr), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), ccms)))

body.origin:

-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))

comment: The scalar field of a subcomplex Hilbert space contains ` RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
